title: Add Brilliant Coaching Centre logo to Hero section

requirements.summary: Replace the current placeholder logo in the Hero component with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero component displays the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and visual quality
Logo is prominently displayed in the hero section
Logo styling is consistent with the existing gold/yellow and maroon brand colors

file_operations.description: Update the Hero component to replace the current logo image source with the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo. Change the img element's src attribute to reference the new logo asset at frontend/public/assets/Brilliant Coaching Centre copy.jpg. Ensure the logo maintains proper aspect ratio, visual quality, and styling consistent with the brand's gold/yellow and maroon colors. Verify the alt text accurately describes the new logo.

requirements.summary: Store the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo as a static asset and update Hero component to reference it
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Hero component src attribute points to the correct asset path
Logo loads correctly on page render

file_operations.description: Copy the uploaded Brilliant Coaching Centre logo file (Brilliant Coaching Centre copy.jpg) to the frontend/public/assets directory. This logo features a lightbulb design with a yellow student figure and the text 'brilliant COACHING CENTRE' in gold/yellow on a dark background with maroon border.

Update the Hero component's logo img element to reference the correct asset path /assets/Brilliant Coaching Centre copy.jpg. Ensure the src attribute uses the public asset path format that will resolve correctly at runtime. Verify the image loads properly and displays with appropriate dimensions in the hero section.
